# USAGE

## Load data and plot something

```{r}
path <- "/home/nicomic/Software/cellID-linux/test_data_tmp/"

cell_data <- rcell2::load_cell_data(path =  path)
cell.data <- rcell2::cell.load.alt(path =  path, ucid.zero.pad = 5)
```

```{r}
cell_data$data %>% ggplot() + geom_point(aes(x=a.tot, y=fft.stat, color = factor(ucid))) + theme(legend.position = "none")
```
